basics.name: Nguyen Minh Trung
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: A third-year Student at Department of Computing Fundamental, FPT University, Viet Nam. I am an artificial intelligence researcher with a solid foundation in mathematics and computer science. I am passionate about Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I am also a member of FPT University's F-Code Club.
